name: Bennett_Black_Leather_Reclining_Sofa
description: The Bennett sofa offers dual recliners with plush cushioning and ample proportions that make for ultra-comfortable seating. This showcases clean, modern lines and padded arms. It is covered in a black leather match fabric. The contemporary design, generous seating, and unique appeal emphasizes proportion and functionality.
